Setup_CTM_on_K8S.Script:
#!/bin/bash -xe
# Use to log execution when not running under Control-M
# - exec 1>/home/ctmmft/srvr_preplog.out 2>&1
# - Control-M job runs as ctmmft user
#
# Provide artifacts for K8S jobs
#
sudo su - bitnami -c "mkdir ctmArtifacts"
sudo su - bitnami -c "wget --no-check-certificate https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/623469066856-fy20seminars/ctmArtifacts.tar"
sudo su - bitnami -c "mv /home/bitnami/ctmArtifacts.tar /home/bitnami/ctmArtifacts/"
sudo su - bitnami -c "tar -xvf /home/bitnami/ctmArtifacts/ctmArtifacts.tar -C /home/bitnami/ctmArtifacts/"
sudo su - bitnami -c "rm /home/bitnami/ctmArtifacts/ctmArtifacts.tar"
#
# Update Control-M Environment Info
#
sudo su - bitnami -c "mkdir ctmArtifacts/ctmprod"
sudo su - bitnami -c "echo "https://controlm:8443/automation-api" > /home/bitnami/ctmArtifacts/ctmprod/endpoint.secret"
sudo su - bitnami -c "echo "apiuser" > /home/bitnami/ctmArtifacts/ctmprod/username.secret"
sudo su - bitnami -c "echo "rtcqlAC2" > /home/bitnami/ctmArtifacts/ctmprod/password.secret"
#
# Provide Kubernetes configuration for K8S API
#
sudo cp /etc/kubernetes/admin.conf /home/bitnami/ctmArtifacts/admin.conf
sudo chown 644 /home/bitnami/ctmArtifacts/admin.conf#
# Label our node so that K8S will start an agent here
#
sudo kubectl label nodes `hostname` WorkflowManager=controlm
#
# Docker Registry secret
#
sudo kubectl create secret docker-registry regcred --docker-server=https://index.docker.io/v1/ --docker-username=joegoldberg --docker-password=yourdockerpassword --docker-email=joe_goldberg@bmc.com
#
# Create Cluster Role and Service Account and define Contorl-M Agent DaemonSet
#
sudo kubectl create -f /home/bitnami/ctmArtifacts/ClusterRole_and_ServiceAccount.yaml
sudo kubectl create -f /home/bitnami/ctmArtifacts/ctmagentDaemonSet.yaml

Setup_Kafka.Script:
#!/bin/bash -xe
# Use to log execution when not running under Control-M
# - exec 1>/home/ctmmft/kafka_preplog.out 2>&1
# - Control-M job runs as ctmmft user
#
# Install Kafka - run as ctmmft user
#
sudo apt-get -y install zookeeperd
sudo adduser --system --no-create-home --disabled-password --disabled-login kafka
cd ~
wget "http://www-eu.apache.org/dist/kafka/2.1.1/kafka_2.12-2.1.1.tgz"
curl http://kafka.apache.org/KEYS | gpg --import
wget https://dist.apache.org/repos/dist/release/kafka/2.1.1/kafka_2.12-2.1.1.tgz.asc
gpg --verify kafka_2.12-2.1.1.tgz.asc kafka_2.12-2.1.1.tgz

sudo mkdir /opt/kafka
sudo tar -xvzf kafka_2.12-2.1.1.tgz --directory /opt/kafka --strip-components 1

rm -rf kafka_2.12-2.1.1.tgz kafka_2.12-2.1.1.tgz.asc

sudo mkdir /var/lib/kafka
sudo mkdir /var/lib/kafka/data
#
# Append the following lines to /opt/kafka/config/server.properties
#
sudo cp /opt/kafka/config/server.properties server.properties.temp
sudo chown ctmmft:ctmmft server.properties.temp
cat << 'EOF' >> server.properties.temp

delete.topic.enable = true 
log.dirs=/var/lib/kafka/data
log.retention.hours=168
log.retention.bytes=104857600
EOF

sudo cp server.properties.temp /opt/kafka/config/server.properties

sudo chown -R kafka:nogroup /opt/kafka
sudo chown -R kafka:nogroup /var/lib/kafka

#
# Set up Kafka as a service 
# ExecStart=/opt/kafka/bin/kafka-server-start.sh /opt/kafka/config/server.properties > /opt/kafka/server.log  <-- optional redirect log
#
cat << 'EOF' > kafka.service 
[Unit]
Description=High-available, distributed message broker
After=network.target
[Service]
User=kafka
ExecStart=/opt/kafka/bin/kafka-server-start.sh /opt/kafka/config/server.properties

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
EOF
sudo mv kafka.service /etc/systemd/system/kafka.service
sudo chown root:root /etc/systemd/system/kafka.service

sudo systemctl start kafka.service
sudo systemctl restart zookeeper.service 
sleep 120

/opt/kafka/bin/kafka-topics.sh --create --zookeeper localhost:2181 --replication-factor 1 --partitions 1 --topic tweets
